'''KAOS Worldwide''' is a privately held sports apparel company based in [[Stafford, Texas]] that pioneered the category of advanced apparel known as Technical Clothing Systems. KAOS was founded by former NFL star [[Bert Emanuel]] and his wife, Teri Emanuel. The company slogan is KAOS: Feel the komfort.
'''KAOS Worldwide''' is a privately held sports apparel company based in [[Stafford, Texas]] that pioneered the category of advanced apparel known as Technical Clothing Systems. KAOS was founded by former NFL star [[Bert Emanuel]] and his wife, Teri Emanuel. The company slogan is KAOS: Feel the komfort.
